thought: To craft black glazed terracotta, I first need to craft terracotta. Terracotta can be crafted from clay by smelting it in a furnace. Therefore, I will smelt the clay at slot 24 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 24 to slot 11 with quantity 1
